00024 #include <math.h>
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 
00027 #include "polynom_solver.h"
00028 #include <general/general.h>
00029 
00030 using namespace std;
00031 
00032 int solve_deg2(double a, double b, double c, double & x1, double & x2)
00033 {
00034   double delta = b * b - 4 * a * c;
00035 
00036   if (delta < 0) return 0;
00037 
00038   double inv_2a = 0.5 / a;
00039 
00040   if (delta == 0)
00041   {
00042     x1 = -b * inv_2a;
00043     x2 = x1;
00044     return 1;
00045   }
00046 
00047   double sqrt_delta = sqrt(delta);
00048   x1 = (-b + sqrt_delta) * inv_2a;
00049   x2 = (-b - sqrt_delta) * inv_2a;
00050   return 2;
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00057 int solve_deg3(double a, double b, double c, double d, 
00058                double & x0, double & x1, double & x2)
00059 {
00060   if (a == 0)
00061   {
00062     // Solve second order sytem
00063     if (b == 0)
00064     {
00065       // Solve first order system
00066       if (c == 0) 
00067         return 0;
00068 
00069       x0 = -d / c;
00070       return 1;
00071     }
00072 
00073     x2 = 0;
00074     return solve_deg2(b, c, d, x0, x1);
00075   }
00076 
00077   // Calculate the normalized form x^3 + a2 * x^2 + a1 * x + a0 = 0
00078   double inv_a = 1. / a;
00079   double b_a = inv_a * b, b_a2 = b_a * b_a;
00080   double c_a = inv_a * c;
00081   double d_a = inv_a * d;
00082 
00083   // Solve the cubic equation
00084   double Q = (3 * c_a - b_a2) / 9;
00085   double R = (9 * b_a * c_a - 27 * d_a - 2 * b_a * b_a2) / 54;
00086   double Q3 = Q * Q * Q;
00087   double D = Q3 + R * R;
00088   double b_a_3 = (1. / 3.) * b_a;
00089 
00090   if (Q == 0) {
00091     if(R == 0) {
00092       x0 = x1 = x2 = - b_a_3;
00093       return 3;
00094     }
00095     else
00096     {
00097       x0 = pow(2 * R, 1 / 3.0) - b_a_3;
00098       return 1;
00099     }
00100   }
00101 
00102   if (D <= 0)
00103   {
00104     // Three real roots
00105     double theta = acos(R / sqrt(-Q3));
00106     double sqrt_Q = sqrt(-Q);
00107     x0 = 2 * sqrt_Q * cos(theta             / 3.0) - b_a_3;
00108     x1 = 2 * sqrt_Q * cos((theta + 2 * M_PI)/ 3.0) - b_a_3;
00109     x2 = 2 * sqrt_Q * cos((theta + 4 * M_PI)/ 3.0) - b_a_3;
00110 
00111     return 3;
00112   }
00113 
00114   // D > 0, only one real root
00115   double AD = pow(fabs(R) + sqrt(D), 1.0 / 3.0) * (R > 0 ? 1 : (R < 0 ? -1 : 0));
00116   double BD = (AD == 0) ? 0 : -Q / AD;
00117 
00118   // Calculate the only real root
00119   x0 = AD + BD - b_a_3;
00120 
00121   return 1;
00122 }
00123 
00127 int solve_deg4(double a, double b, double c, double d, double e,
00128                double & x0, double & x1, double & x2, double & x3)
00129 {
00130   if (a == 0) 
00131   {
00132     x3 = 0;
00133     return solve_deg3(b, c, d, e, x0, x1, x2);
00134   }
00135 
00136   // Normalize coefficients
00137   double inv_a = 1. / a;
00138   b *= inv_a; c *= inv_a; d *= inv_a; e *= inv_a;
00139   double b2 = b * b, bc = b * c, b3 = b2 * b;
00140 
00141   // Solve resultant cubic
00142   double r0, r1, r2;
00143   int n = solve_deg3(1, -c, d * b - 4 * e, 4 * c * e - d * d - b2 * e, r0, r1, r2);
00144   if (n == 0) return 0;
00145 
00146   // Calculate R^2
00147   double R2 = 0.25 * b2 - c + r0, R;
00148   if (R2 < 0)
00149     return 0;
00150 
00151   R = sqrt(R2);
00152   double inv_R = 1. / R;
00153 
00154   int nb_real_roots = 0;
00155 
00156   // Calculate D^2 and E^2
00157   double D2, E2;
00158   if (R < 10E-12)
00159   {
00160     double temp = r0 * r0 - 4 * e;
00161     if (temp < 0)
00162       D2 = E2 = -1;
00163     else
00164     {
00165       double sqrt_temp = sqrt(temp);
00166       D2 = 0.75 * b2 - 2 * c + 2 * sqrt_temp;
00167       E2 = D2 - 4 * sqrt_temp;
00168     }
00169   }
00170   else
00171   {
00172     double u = 0.75 * b2 - 2 * c - R2, v = 0.25 * inv_R * (4 * bc - 8 * d - b3);
00173     D2 = u + v;
00174     E2 = u - v;
00175   }
00176 
00177   double b_4 = 0.25 * b, R_2 = 0.5 * R;
00178   if (D2 >= 0) {
00179     double D = sqrt(D2);
00180     nb_real_roots = 2;
00181     double D_2 = 0.5 * D;
00182     x0 = R_2 + D_2 - b_4;
00183     x1 = x0 - D;
00184   }
00185 
00186   // Calculate E^2
00187   if (E2 >= 0) {
00188     double E = sqrt(E2);
00189     double E_2 = 0.5 * E;
00190     if (nb_real_roots == 0)
00191     {
00192       x0 = - R_2 + E_2 - b_4;
00193       x1 = x0 - E;
00194       nb_real_roots = 2;
00195     }
00196     else
00197     {
00198       x2 = - R_2 + E_2 - b_4;
00199       x3 = x2 - E;
00200       nb_real_roots = 4;
00201     }
00202   }
00203 
00204   return nb_real_roots;
00205 }
